english.segment1: I could be your satellite. I could give your MTV. You don't need a dish tonight. I get all these things for free
english.segment2: Download this screen Saviour. When you're done saving save yourself. You could stay online in your car. chatline no matter where you are
english.segment3: Virtual reality: Just not real enough for me
english.segment4: Jesus Christ is still alive. I'm waiting for Him to arrive. And interactive courier above all multimedia
english.segment5: Optical Holography: Have no faith in what you see
english.segment6: Open up your window. how far are you prepared to go?. Could be more than just one drive. How many flavors have your tried?
english.segment7: Go: spiritually. No one here gets saved for free
english.segment8: Somewhere inside of me is the promise of eternity. Somewhere inside of me is the promise of eternity. Somewhere inside of you is the. promise that you hide from view
english.segment9: You don't need to understand. You just need to take His hand
